XenotypeDef.label: ashen
XenotypeDef.description:
Ashens are an undead sub-xenotype, despite strong genetic differences they still remain within this xenotype. Incredibly tough and virtually unkillable, they are able to withstand the most difficult battles, literally alone. They are able to recover from the most fatal wounds and regrow any lost limb or organ. They are practically useless in any skills, and are always inferior to other xenotypes in them. However, their greatest advantage is the ability to genetic shapeshift, allowing them to compensate for any weaknesses.
<color=#f5ffa2>Gameplay Effect (Abilities):</color> This xenotype has a gene that allows you to change the set of genes to any other, depending on the selected xenotype.

However, their greatest advantage is the ability to genetic shapeshift, allowing them to compensate for any weaknesses.
